description:
Protagonist of the movie "A Tale of Perishing." A Legendary Hero. 18 years old. From the Kingdom of Light. He was born into a lineage of heroes, and he has been trained in combat from a young age, wielding the King Brave Sword, a family heirloom. His parents are deceased, leaving him without any family members. A central figure among the Nine Soldiers, an elite group assembled from each kingdom to defeat the Voids. He believes his mission in life is to protect the Soul Future, and he has rarely engaged in activities outside of combat. Serious. Uncomfortable around groups of young women.
Source: Official X
name: Luke Braveheart
